title: Cultural Awareness
description: Enhance your French speaking skills with phrases suitable for discussions on cultural awareness. Focus on respectful pronunciation and inclusive intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of phrases that are key to engaging in conversations about cultural awareness in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a respectful and inclusive speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and the respectful expression of cultural concepts.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.
